name: Plug (Flip Table Games)
description:
Your ship is flying home, but its damaged and you only have one plug you can share between each system. Each system has a separate charge, the plug will recharge it, but the plug has its own battery. you recharge it by plugging it into the main breaker. Systems break randomly and needs left click to be repaired, then clicked. Every time a system runs out of power, the ship is damaged, enough damage will blow up your ship. Manage your time and power wisely to ensure you can get back home.

Controls:

Left Click to pick up the plug

R to restart if necessary
